channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Venezuela reportedly to continue supplying oil to US beyond 50m barrels announced by Trump
item.description: US to remove some sanctions to allow Venezuelan oil sales ‘indefinitely’, CNBC reports, citing White House sources Business live – latest updates Vene...

item.title: Trump claims China and Russia have ‘zero fear’ of Nato without US; officials briefs Congress on Venezuela operation – live
item.description: Trump says he ‘doubted Nato would be there for us if we really needed them’; Marco Rubio and Pete Hegseth hold briefing for Senate and House Miranda B...

item.title: Farage says he would vote against deploying British troops to Ukraine – UK politics live
item.description: Farage claims that ‘we neither have the manpower nor the equipment’ to get involved in Ukraine during Time Radio interview Farage is now talking about...

item.title: Trump administration reportedly warns Maduro ally Diosdado Cabello could be next
item.description: Washington signals interior minister must back acting president, Delcy Rodríguez, or face Nicolás Maduro’s fate The Trump administration has reportedl...

item.title: UK supported US seizure of Russian-flagged tanker, says Ministry of Defence – live
item.description: Marinera, also known as the Bella 1, has been taken over in North Atlantic with second Venezuela-linked vessel seized in Caribbean People in Greenland...

item.title: Police told wrong family teen had died in crash
item.description: South Yorkshire Police says it mixed up the identities of the teen with another male in the car.

item.title: How new road safety measures could affect you
item.description: The government is proposing lowering alcohol limits for drivers and regular eye tests for older motorists.

item.title: Venezuela's interim leader sacks general in charge of Maduro's guard
item.description: General Javier Marcano Tábata was the commander of the inner circle of guards tasked with protecting Maduro.

item.title: UK viewers warm up for steamy ice hockey hit Heated Rivalry
item.description: The latest word-of-mouth hit arrives in the UK after setting pulses racing across the Atlantic.

item.title: Murderer and fellow inmate who absconded from prison are caught
item.description: Murderer Matthew Armstrong and Daniel Washbourne are arrested on suspicion of escaping lawful custody.
